name: Miami Law
description:
In Miami Law, Law Martin, a reckless Miami PD detective, and Sara
Starling, the brainy FBI agent, must work together to save Miami from a
shadow terrorist conspiracy. From shoot-outs to car chases to
crime-scene investigation, Miami Law is an experience worthy of a
prime-time TV series.

Features

• Action and investigation, all in one: Survive event sequences such as
furious shoot-outs in abandoned warehouses, chase fleeing criminals down
the freeway, and disarm bombs mere seconds from explosion. Or tax your
brain with event sequences like finding vital fingerprints, analyzing
mysterious evidence, or performing video surveillance to save your
partner’s life. The choice is yours, depending on which character you
want to follow.
• Choose your character and change the story: Pick
your character and experience the story from different points of view.
Choose from Law Martin, the hotheaded action junkie from the Miami PD
who’d prefer to shoot first and ask questions later or Sara Starling,
the cool, intellectual FBI agent who’s best at analyzing the situation
before leaping into the fray. You can even change between the characters
at numerous points in the story!
• Unlockable extras: Once you
complete the game, you’ll unlock several additional games, including
poker and Sudoku, and event sequences to play whenever you want!
